item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Wow Matthew, that looks fantastic. I hope you're enjoying your holiday. I guess you were in need of one. I've started my 'baby holiday' today - very wierd. Have already done laundry and house stuff, been to the bookshop and (sadly) checked work email! Going to be interesting to see how I fill the time. <br/><br/><br/><br/>See you at the weekend, have a fab holiday:<br/><br/><img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded:
Wow Matthew, that looks fantastic. I hope you’re enjoying your holiday. I guess you were in need of one. I’ve started my ‘baby holiday’ today – very wierd. Have already done laundry and house stuff, been to the bookshop and (sadly) checked work email! Going to be interesting to see how I fill the time.

See you at the weekend, have a fab holiday:

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif“>
